name: yesNoFormat
description: Yes, for a true value; No for a false value, empty string or null. Throws an exception for other values.

params.name: value
params.description: A Boolean value or empty string

examples.title: Example of Yes
examples.description: Pass in a true value outputs Yes

examples.title: Example of No
examples.description: Pass in a false value outputs No

examples.title: Example of empty string
examples.description: Pass in an empty string outputs No
